metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2087 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the client in HexChat 2.11.0 allowsremote IRC servers to read or modify arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) inthe server name.

criterions.comment: hexchat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xchat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xchat-gnome: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
